name: Scrolling Screenshot & Website Annotation App
description: The best full page scrolling screenshot annotation tool. Add drawings, arrows, text & signatures. Share links & export to PDF.

take-area-screenshot.description: Takes screenshot of selected area & uploads to Markup Hero

take-tab-screenshot.description: Takes screenshot of current tab & uploads to Markup Hero

take-scrolling-screenshot.description: Takes scrolling screenshot & uploads to Markup Hero

open-markups.description: Opens new tab that allows you to upload images or PDF for annotation
